You can use CloneDVD2 to compress the video or  to strip out PCM and keep video intact. Though "uraphake" (interesting name...) says it will burn without problems. If you want you could try allowing Overburn in the burner program and use a DVD-R instead of DVD+R (holds a tiny bit more) but I'm not sure it will work.
